Translations.Text: Allahacya navane arambha karato, jo motha krpavana ani atisaya daya karanara ahe
Sarva stuti - prasansa allahakarita ahe, jo samasta visvaca palanahara 1 ahe
Motha krpavana, atisaya daya karanara ahe
Amhi tujhica upasana karato ani tujhyakadeca madatici yacana karato
Asa lokanca marga, jyancyavara tu krpa keli, tya lokanca navhe, jyancyavara tujha prakopa jhala ani na margabhrasta jhalelyanca
